definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hedge, or fence about, shut in (‖ form of [[שׂוךְ]] prob. not connected with Ar. 4awkun Eth. 3ok: thorns; poss. cf. Syr, sok finish, Pa. sayek finish, conclude, comprehend, and Ar. sak=a close, close up, stop, stop up, lock up Lane:1386);—

definitions.title: Hiph.,
definitions.body: but cf. [[שׂוּךְ]]) Impf. 3 ms. [[וַ֫יׇּסֶח אֱלוֹהַּ בַּעֲדוֹ]] Job 3:23, c. acc. + [[בְּ]] instr. [[וַיׇּ֫סֶח בִּדְלָתַיִם יׇ֑ם]] Job 38:8 and (who) shut in the sea with doors ? (Bi Bu [[וּמִי סָח]], Me [[מִי סָח]]).
